title: NLM
description: Once when Steven is done having intercourse with his loving, caring, and frankly annoying girlfriend, he plops down on his living-room couch and begins flirtatiously bantering back and forth on his smart phone with an attractive black woman who he matches with on his Tinder account. He plans a meet with this "lead," as he so calls them, and so begins this unapologetically offensive and completely hilarious look into the mind of a male who has no regard for any single human being's feelings but to satisfy his own savagely sadistic desires. Through all of his superficial encounters, he finds himself asking this one simple, fleeting question: Is it possible that NO LIVES MATTER?
author: Kev K
